description: Part demolition of existing buildings in a Conservation Area  part redevelopment  part retention and refrbishment of former brewery site to provide: offices - 56 311 sqm  workshop/studios - 8 330 sqm  pub/wine bar /restaurant - 1 301 sqm  day nursery - 375 sqm  gallery - 285 sqm  community meeting room - 150 sqm  within new buildings rising to 9 storeys above ground level and refurbished buildings including the Canon Brewery building at 156 St John Street and the former bonded warehouse on Berry Street  alterations to Compton Passage  new pedestrian areas  parking and servicing. PROPOSED PLANS:A.001E 002E 003D 004E; CH.001B 002B; CS. 001C 002A; B.001B-003B; CAN.001 002; J.001E 002E 003G- 005G 006F-012F 020G 021F-023F 030E 031E; P.001B; D.001; O.001C 010 011 012 020. THIS IS A DUPLICATE APPLICATION. SEE 90/1114 & 90/1115.
decision_conditions: APPLICATION WITHDRAWN AS LATER SCHEME AGREED (SEE 91/0345 FOR MAIN REPORT).
